import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./Cartlist.css"; import StarRating from './StarRating'; function Cartlist(props) { let [countqty, setcountqty] = useState(1); const billingAmount = props.price * countqty; return ( <>

{props.title}

({props.rate})

₹ {props.price}

for {props.ppv} {props.unit}

{countqty > 1 ? ( ) : ( )} {countqty}

₹ {billingAmount}

for {countqty} {props.unit}

); } export default Cartlist;
